description:
The ideal candidate is a leader who can successfully develop and manage a diverse team. You will solve client problems while providing exceptional service and help develop new business opportunities.

Key roles and responsibilities:

• Sell Data & Analytics (D&A) Technology Solutions to pharmaceutical, biotech, and life science companies.

• Identify new potential business prospects across Pharma, Biotech, VC, Non-profits, research institutes, and agrochemical segments and build a pipeline of opportunities through various activities including leveraging network, desk-bound research, cold calling, attending events, networking, etc.

• Meet/exceed quarterly and annual sales targets: You will carry individual sales targets, but will also be expected to collaborate with the current global sales team by bringing a combination of domain and technology expertise to help them close deals.

• Identify/contact/nurture key decision makers at the prospect and existing accounts and facilitate meetings with the technical teams and senior leadership as required. This role will collaborate extensively with our technical and solutioning teams and the Business Unit Head in engaging with clients in a consultative approach.

• In both existing and new accounts utilize strong sales skills throughout the sales cycle to understand client needs, identify opportunities, coordinate presentations, work with the solutioning team to share client-facing proposals, and close deals.

• Utilize strong interpersonal skills to negotiate contracts and/or proposals and build long-term relationships with both clients and internal partners.

• Travel to develop and grow customer relationships.

• Work with Inside Sales to drive effective prospecting of new clients

• Using CRM, maintain up-to-date sales information, visit reports, forecasts/pipelines, report individual sales results, and analysis/interpretation of sales trends.
